info.description: API Gateway for WeTask - A collaborative task management system
info.title: WeTask API Gateway

post.description: Authenticate user with email and password. Returns JWT access and refresh tokens.

200.description: Login successful - returns access and refresh tokens

post.description: Get a new access token using a valid refresh token. Returns new access and refresh tokens.

200.description: Token refreshed successfully - returns new access and refresh tokens

post.description: Register a new user with email, password, and name. Returns JWT tokens for authentication.

get.description: Get a list of all boards for teams where the user is a member

post.description: Create a new board in the specified team. User must be a team member.

404.description: Team not found or user not a team member

get.description: Get board information including columns and metadata

delete.description: Delete a board and all its columns and tasks

get.description: Get all columns in the specified board

post.description: Create a new column in the specified board

delete.description: Delete a column and all its tasks

post.description: Create a new task in a column. Title and columnId are required; other fields are optional.

get.description: Get all tasks for a specific board, organized by columns
Get task information by task ID including assigned user and column details

put.description: Update task information (title, description, priority, assignedTo). All fields are optional. Priority: low, medium, high

delete.description: Delete a task by ID. This will also delete all comments associated with the task.

post.description: Add a comment to a task. The comment author is automatically set to the authenticated user.

get.description: Get all comments for a specific task, ordered by creation date (oldest first)

put.description: Move a task from one column to another within the same board

400.description: Invalid request - validation error or columns not in same board

get.description: Get a list of all teams accessible to the authenticated user

post.description: Create a new team with the authenticated user as owner. The creator is automatically added as a member.

get.description: Get team information by team ID including members and boards

post.description: Add a user to a team with an optional role. The user must exist in the system.

409.description: User is already a member of the team

delete.description: Remove a user from a team. The user will lose access to all team boards.

400.description: Invalid team or user ID format

get.description: Get the authenticated user's information. User ID is extracted from JWT token.
Get user information by user ID

patch.description: Update user information (name and/or email). Both fields are optional.

description.example: Add new feature to the app
Add new feature to the app

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token.
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
